attributes.additional_details:
The Government need to pass a law that ensures RFID chips are NEVER legally permitted in humans in the UK and also that the law can never be repealed.
It goes completely against our basic human rights - humans are not the property of anyone to be tagged and monitored or tracked no matter what the chips are intended for.
These chips are also going to lead to more security risks anyway, we know how easy it is to hack systems as it is, to risk every bit of our critical data being carried around with us and then stolen and replicated.

This would be the worst misuse of technology, and it is already happening so needs dealing with head on.
http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-31042477
